welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wauwatosa, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant community, and beautiful parks. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore all that this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is a satellite terminal located on the south side of the airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is a satellite terminal located on the north side of the airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
